Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a Security Hub insight. For example, arn:aws:securityhub:us-west-1:123456789012:insight/123456789012/custom/a1b2c3d4-5678-90ab-cdef-EXAMPLE11111.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The ARN of a Security Hub insight.
